[[File:Matěj Čadil - Brilthor.jpg|thumb|''Brilthor''by [[Matěj Čadil]]]]
'''Brilthor''' was one of the six swift rivers that flowed westward from the mountains of the [[Ered Luin]] to meet the long course of the [[Gelion]] on the borders of [[Ossiriand]].  The Brilthor lay between the rivers [[Legolin]] and [[Duilwen]].<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Brilthor'' is said to mean "glittering torrent" in [[Ilkorin]], from ''[[bril]]'' ("glass, crystal") and a form of ''[[thórod]]'' ("torrent").<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, pp. 372 (entry "[[MBÍRIL|MBIRIL]]"), 392-3 (entries "THOR-", "THORON-")</ref>
